# Butters: A Django Web Application

![Logo]([https://www.expressanalytics.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/sentimentanalysishotelgeneric-2048x803-1.jpg](https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/3bbdb76e-97da-48c6-844a-cd5b322bb638/dafq7y0-59ee3006-0719-42b6-b5d3-bee3f42d5f7d.png/v1/fill/w_400,h_541/south_park_transparent_waving_butters___by_realartistcrafter_dafq7y0-fullview.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..JVts7IUJIZz2dJltoxSfdp6w-sbTKauSOJ51awqGWHs)https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/3bbdb76e-97da-48c6-844a-cd5b322bb638/dafq7y0-59ee3006-0719-42b6-b5d3-bee3f42d5f7d.png/v1/fill/w_400,h_541/south_park_transparent_waving_butters___by_realartistcrafter_dafq7y0-fullview.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..JVts7IUJIZz2dJltoxSfdp6w-sbTKauSOJ51awqGWHs)

In this project, I use Django to build a web application that uses Python to scrape comments off of YouTube videos and uses NLP to filter out any negative comments. I’m a South Park fan, so I justly called it Butters’ Safe Space and gave it a thematic flavor where Butters gets more and more depressed with the greater number of negative comments he must filter.

* Python
* Django
* HTML/CSS
* NLP (Vader, HuggingFace, Tensorflow)
* Web Scraping
* ETL
